predicate.note: Frames file for 'buoy' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'float'

roleset.name: cause to float

example.name: active
example.text: A shiny new takeover deal sparked a big rally in stock prices, which *trace* buoyed the dollar.

example.name: passive
example.text: Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co., buoyed *trace* by improved operating profit in its tire segment, reported that third-quarter net income rose 11% to $70.5 million, or $1.22 a share.
example.arg: improved operating profit in its tire segment

roleset.note: Bonus points for anyone who can tell me how to pronounce this verb.
